Articles.Content: I have a horrible experience trying to use this forum while at work (on my lunch break, of course) but I assume that's just because I'm on a crappy work computer running a handicapped version of IE. Have no problems at home browsing on Chrome. Here at work it's so bad I actually type my replies in notepad, then paste them over, right clicking no less, because Ctrl+V doesn't work.

I don't think this is something we can change to be honest.

Maybe try [URL="http://portableapps.com/"][U]a portable version[/U][/URL] of a decent browser instead?
Do you use the full site version of the forums?

Yeah, this was supposed to be in response to someone else's comment, not it's own thread. It's not really a concern for me, our computers at work suck and that's the way it is, just thought it might be the same problem for another user who was having issues.
